description:
Trekking poles are all about balance. These ones balance features like super-secure FlickLock adjustments with a price that keeps you poised.

  • Soft rubber grips are insulating, comfortable and extremely durable
  • 360-degree padded webbing straps are left- and right-hand specific for a custom fit
  • Non-slip foam extension grips let you slide your hands down on steep terrain and sidehills
  • FlickLock® mechanisms offer fast, secure length adjustment
  • Carbide Tech tips are secured with WaveLock attachments so it's easy to swap them out with other tips
  • Includes low-profile trekking baskets. Compatible with powder baskets (sold separately)
name: Black Diamond Trail Trek Poles - Unisex
